description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller 'HelloController' that provides several basic endpoints including a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic application endpoints such as welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to the user.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects incoming requests to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the application's health status, indicating if the application is running properly.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
